name: Noah's Balloon
description:
Save people from rising lava with your hot-air balloon, but don't forget, to save some you need to sacrifice others!

Objective: Gather as many people as possible from locations and reach the end goal before lava kills you. Be careful with wind fields and spikes!

WASD = Balloon movement
Left Click = Throw  a person in a direction to boost yourself in opposite direction

Fun little game developed for Ludum Dare 43
by Jan Szczepanik-Dzikowski and Anil Demir
in 2 days in December 2018

Music: Heftone Banjo Orchestra
Font: BPreplay by George Triantafyllakos
